title: Tarapoto - Chachapoyas - Mysterious Kuelap

itinerary.day: Day 01: Flight & Native City Tour Lamas

activities.text: Flight to Tarapoto.

Free morning to acclimatize, then we will begin the tour in Lamas, considered the folkloric capital of the Peruvian Amazon and the city of three natural levels, where nature, folklore, and culture intertwine. Visit to the native neighborhood, viewpoint, and handicrafts.
Dinner.
Breakfast.

Departure to Laguna Azul, along the Fernando Belaunde Terry South highway to Puerto López, where we will cross the Huallaga River on a captive raft. Then we arrive at the majestic Laguna Azul (430.80 ha, approx. 35 m deep). Boat ride, visit Dos de Mayo village, swimming, jet ski and zipline (optional).
Dinner.

itinerary.day: Day 03: Ecotouristic Excursion to Santa Elena

activities.text: Early departure to the Posic area.
Breakfast, hotel check-in.
Canoe tour to the wetlands and renaco forests of Santa Elena (Alto Mayo), sailing along the Romero River, landscape appreciation, observation of birds and primates. Overnight in Rioja.
Lunch at Yacumama resort and visit to Tioyacu recreational center.
Departure to Chachapoyas (4-hour trip).
Dinner and overnight in Chachapoyas (3-star hotel).
Breakfast.

Departure to Tingo to board the cable cars to the Kuelap archaeological complex. Visit the site museum, fortress, gateways, military areas, and ceremonial tinteros. Return to Chachapoyas. Overnight in 3-star hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 05: Gocta Waterfall & Trip to Tarapoto

activities.text: Departure.
Breakfast (to-go) and visit to Gocta waterfall, one of the tallest in the world. Observation of wildlife and plants.
Lunch.
Departure to Tarapoto, dinner and overnight stay.
Breakfast.
Visit to Ahuashiyacu waterfall, located in the Amazon district of San Martín, 14 km from downtown. Enjoyment and free afternoon. Departure to airport.
